attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Accept the recommendations of the Parole Board and release immediately Ronnie Biggs. He has suffered enough.

rejection.details: As stated in our terms and conditions, we cannot accept petitions on individual legal cases. Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
